name: Bird Balls XL
description:
Bird Balls XL is an action game.
When you tap the egg, the birds will fly from there to the left and up.
The level is complete when the birds pick up all the food.
When the bird touches the red ball, the PW will decrease.
When the bird picks up the food, he will turn green. The green bird can destroy the red ball.
When PW becomes 0, the game is over.
